text: Fernando Jorge Fígueiredo Campos, known as Nando (born 9 November 1963) is a retired Angolan-born Portuguese football midfielder. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Rio Ave F.C. players Category:Vitória F.C. players Category:F.C.
